attributes.action: Politicians and Parties should transfer their Russian donations to Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: To support the brave defenders of Ukraine from the fascist gangsterism of Putin.
attributes.background: It is critical that any politician or political party who has accepted donations from individuals or organisations that have Russian origin must transfer these funds to the Democratic Government of Ukraine.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about use of political donations are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.

There are rules that apply to money donated to political parties, which you can find out about here: https://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/sites/default/files/pdf_file/to-donations-rp.pdf
